scripts.mobile:setup: npm run leaf install && npm run build:mobile && npx cap add ios && npx cap add android
scripts.mobile:ios: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.mobile:android: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.mobile:sync: npm run build:mobile && npx cap sync
scripts.dev:ios: npm run cap:sync:ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.dev:android: npm run cap:sync:android && npx cap run android
scripts.clean:mobile: npm run clean:capacitor && npm run leaf uninstall
